Pre-Game Insights: England take on Sri Lanka in a do-or-die clash.
A win against Sri Lanka, irrespective of the margin, will put England in the semi-finals and knock Australia out.
Sri Lanka might be eliminated from the semi-final race, but they will be no pushovers.
Sri Lanka have won the toss and opted to bat.
Chamika Karunaratne returns to the playing XI for Sri Lanka, while England are going in with an unchanged team for the must-win match.
Miscellaneous Highlights: Since this is a used pitch, the surface could take some turn. Batting second might not be as easy.
Others: On-field umpires: Paul Reiffel, Paul Wilson
